item.title: Japanese Tragedy
item.author: norman@dunbar-it.co.uk (Norman Dunbar)
item.description: Earthquake, tsunami and nuclear problems. Like they don’t have enough trouble with just one of these? And as usual, the religious fuck-wits are coming out of the woodwork with their completely ridiculous claims that it’s all “someone’s” fault - be that someone the gays, women (it’s usually one of these groups to blame for everything according to the fundies!) or someone else. Mind you, the Daily Mail isn’t much better, reporting on a astrologist (did you know, astrologist is an anagram of fuckwit?
item.dc:creator: Norman Dunbar
